trans-unit.source: Provides the transition to a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> in a state machine workflow.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a transição para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> em um fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> can be used only in state machine workflows.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> pode ser usado apenas em fluxos de trabalho de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> provides transitions only to leaf <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities (a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> that does not contain other <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> fornece transições somente para folha <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> atividades (um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> que não contém outros <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> atividades).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> only provides transitions between two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> classes and does not support <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> to parent <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> transitions or any other combination.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> fornece apenas as transições entre dois <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> classes e não oferece suporte a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> pai <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> transições ou qualquer outra combinação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> has to be a leaf node within the activity tree of an event handler.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> deve ser um nó folha na árvore de atividade de um manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: There can be more than one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> but all the activities must be leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver mais de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> mas todas as atividades devem ser nós folha.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> is always the last activity in the run path of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> é sempre a última atividade no caminho de execução de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> atividade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e) sample.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [simples máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e) exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [simples máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome da atividade definido pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity" /> usando o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the target state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do estado de destino.

trans-unit.source: The name of the target stream.
trans-unit.target: O nome do fluxo de destino.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> class and use it implement a simple state machine to transition between 3 states, and set the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classe ele implementa um estado simple de uso do computador para fazer a transição entre 3 estados e defina o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do exemplo SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK do arquivo StateMachineWorkflow.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [simples máquina de estado](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> que tem como destino a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName" />.
